title: Vertex Locates On The Axis of Symmetry
text: The vertex is a point on the line of symmetry, so its x-coordinate will be $$x=-4$$. We only need to compute $$f(-4)$$ to get the $$y$$ coordinate.

title: Compute The y-coordinate
text: Plug $$x=-4$$ into the equation $$f(x)=x^2+8x-1$$. What is $$f(-4)$$?
